column1: Uchi////High points:  Hama chili with cool orange and hot jalapeño
column3: sticky and crispy side of Brussels Sprouts
column4: smoky Bass with brown butter and grapes (kurodai)
column5: Pork belly (bacon tataki) with crispy coriander or fennel
column6: Red Snapper in delicate green curry (madai game) warm and slightly spicy
column7: Hamachi nabe which is mixed table side to cook the baby yellowtail - it turned out like a warm tasty tableside porridge.
